responses: Hello! How can I assist with your vehicle today?
Hi there! What vehicle service do you need help with?
You can check your request status in the 'My Requests' section of your dashboard
Your vehicle status will be updated by your mechanic. Check your requests page for details.
Oil changes typically range from ₹1500-₹3000 depending on your vehicle type
Brake service costs between ₹2000-₹6000 based on your vehicle model and parts needed
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?
Happy to help! Let me know if you have other questions.
